meanings.sent1: My lineage can be traced back to my great-grandfather.
meanings.sent2: The royal lineage has a long history of rulers.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how my lineage all have the same nose!
meanings.sent4: Her lineage of artists flows like a river through history.
meanings.sent5: The lineage of the ancient kings was shrouded in mystery.

meanings.definition: A sequence of people from the same family who are related by blood.
meanings.sent1: The lineage of siblings includes three brothers and two sisters.
meanings.sent2: In our family lineage, we have a tradition of passing down heirlooms.
meanings.sent3: The lineage of cousins gathered for a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The lineage of athletes in their family is truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: Their lineage is like a tree with branches reaching far and wide.
